title: Handkerchief, 1936
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Henry M. Fechimer
description: Commemorative handkerchief showing a crowned portrait of Edward, Prince of Wales in military uniform with orders, flags on either side and a ribbon inscribed with "Long Live Edward VIII Emperor" below. In each corner: a shield with the Union Flag, scepters and floral sprays of rose, thistle, shamrock and leek. Printed in black, red, blue, green and yellow.

tombstone.epitaph:
Handkerchief, 1936.
1936. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Henry M. Fechimer. 1941-61-26.
